This is a post with news on Drug supply chain integrity.

Description:

• Explored proof-of-concept application that keeps track of drug records using blockchain technology in a decentralized way

• Enables manufacturer, supplier, patients, and pharmacists to manage, access a complete individual drug life cycle in a secure and accountable way through comprehensive logs.

• To achieve the transparency, security, and privacy of the proposed system, we used a smartcontract developed in the solidity programming language in combination with permission blockchain architecture.
